website_summaries.verdict: This well-made stuffer is crafted with quality metal gears and a gear box to keep them in top condition.
pros: Includes stuffing tubes for 1/2", 3/4" and 1" inner diameter sizes
Gear box protects hardened steel gears
Comes with two clamps that help attach stuffer to counter top
Diameter Measures 15" H x 9 1/4" W x 6" D
cons: Plunger assembly can be difficult to remove from the cylinder

customer_reviews.title: This is the One
customer_reviews.text: I was using my grinder to stuff my Sausage, but it blends the Meat & Fat together into a Paste. So I needed a Stuffer and wanted a Good one. You get what you pay for! This LEM 5 lbs. Sausage Stuffer "EXCELLENT"! Very well build, Stainless Steel, and works with NO EFFORT! Wonderful! This Stuffer is definitely a Commercial Stuffer, No Homeowner stuff here! I've been making all types of Sausage. Beef, Pork, Chicken, and Turkey. I am experimenting with all types of Sausages. I must try Squirrel, and my wife's Cat is missing . . . You'll love this Stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: CitySlicker Tony

customer_reviews.title: We're has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes stuffing sausage a one man job. having control of the speed makes it easy to Just make great sausage. Clean up is the same as my Manuel one just bigger by 15 pounds. But over all it is a great product. It was delivered early than it was supposed to arrive on x-mas week. Must buy
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: The included clamps are a nice touch, and everything else about the product is ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuffer works well for personal/light commercial applications. My only complaint is that the included stuffing nozzles had a little molding slag around the tip. Initially I had some difficulty with my sausage casings ripping, so I scraped the tip smooth with a razor blade. This remedied the problem. The included clamps are a nice touch, and everything else about the product is sturdy and well engineered. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Huddle

customer_reviews.title: The proper way to stuff sausage
customer_reviews.text: Was using my grinder to pack sausage - big mistake, it worked, but poorly. Purchased this LEM unit and it works excellently. Nothing wrong with my grinder but use it for grinding and use a sausage stuffer for making sausage and now everything is better. The unit itself is heavy duty stainless, except the tubes which are plastic. The enclosed gear means no lubrication needed and no risk of getting unwanted things caught up in the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: rapunzel

customer_reviews.title: Great results thus far
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for a few months. Have done 5 batches of sausage - about 20 to 25 pounds of meet each. Great results thus far. I do oil the walls of the press with olive oil to reduce the friction. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: VLSH

customer_reviews.title: Made 25lbs rope sausage 20lbs sticks when it arrived easy clean worked to the speed I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I've stuffed casings full of everything that looked ate able . Have RA in my hands couldn't crank and feed casings. Made 25lbs rope sausage 20lbs sticks when it arrived easy clean worked to the speed I wanted. Great machine I have Lem products, everyone works great Now will see if it stands up, make about 700lbs A year of whatever
customer_reviews.author: Myron Schlafman

customer_reviews.title: Way easier than a grinder! Cleans up quick and easily.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Doesn’t quite hold 5lbs without getting passed the seals. Also the vertical bars are a little crooked. Can probably be shifted back to center easily. Pros: whips out perfectly stuffed casings quick. Did 5lbs of snack sticks in like 10 minutes on my first try. Also did 5 lbs of summer sausage in like 5 min. Easy to clean, easy to use. Some people won’t like that you have to crank it all the way back out to add more meat.. but it didn’t bother me. Still way faster and easier than using a grinder.
customer_reviews.author: DuckWhisperer99

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much easier than grinder w/ attachment!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the sausage stuffer attachment on my grinder for a couple years but finally got tired of messing with the cumbersome setup, so I purchased the LEM 5lb stuffer. This thing is amazing! So much easier to use and clean. It also comes with two C-clamps to secure the stuffer to your surface of choice, so you’re ready to go as soon as you get it! It’s a well built, solid unit with steel gears - not plastic like others. If you take care of this thing, it will last a lifetime! Wish I would have bought this years ago. Would have saved a ton of time and frustration!
customer_reviews.author: BaldHairDontCare

customer_reviews.title: Great for stuffing sausages with 1 person
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuffer to replace my dakotah water stuffer, which worked fine but was a bit messy and difficult to operate solo. The motorized LEM stuffer works great. One tip: when stuffing snack sticks, make sure to reverse the stuffer before reaching the end of the casings, otherwise it will continue to extrude farce beyond the casing. This didn't seem to be an issue with breakfast sausage or brats.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: Always shied away from doing snack sticks and small breakfast sausages due to a dry mixture being so hard to crank through a stuffer. This stuffer was a game-changer. You can run it at its lowest speed or turn it the whole way up and it has no trouble with the driest Meats. There isn't enough Stars to say how happy I am with this product. Raised on a farm and processing Meats my whole life this has definitely changed everything for me. Thank you LEM... also have their number 32 grinder and a big mixer. Top Notch absolutely top-notch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really easily and efficiently
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuffer! It is really easy to use - so much easier than the stuffer attachment for the KitchenAid mixer I was using before. The air release effortlessly keeps the sausages free of air bubbles, which was our biggest problem. The only thing I don't like is the plastic stuffing tubes. I did file the edges as suggested by another reviewer before using them to prevent the casings from tearing, which works fine, but I just don't feel that I can get plastic as clean as stainless steel. LEM should provide stainless steel tubes instead. Other than that, it really is a fabulous piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henley

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffer
customer_reviews.text: This stuffer really simplified the process. It costs a good bit, but I feel like the fact that I'm no longer openly cursing in front of my family while stuffing sausages justifies the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Only used it about four times, but the arms have bent. Because of that, the plunger does not stay level and the meat squeezes past the o-ring. Bending it back hasn't helped, as it just shifts back to bent again. Edit: Customer service was awesome and they replaced the part even thought it was past warranty. Really happy again.
customer_reviews.author: pencatthing

customer_reviews.title: Works great, one easily fixed flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. It works really well, I only had one minor issue that was easily resolved. The stuffer tubes had a small bur lip on the end that make installing natural hog casing a little difficult. I had to use the back edge of a knife to scrape off the bur edge. Once I did that I had no other issues. It was great that it came with two table clamps. The clamps made one man operation a breeze! Thanks LEM for a well made product. And the LEM brand Bratwurst seasoning is great!
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: QA/QC Should be Better
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5/5 stars; however, base of item was bent pretty good on two corners as if it were dropped during packing. The box was completely intact; therefore, I do not believe it was damaged during shipping. I was able to place item upon a rigid surface and flatten by carefully tapping with a hammer. Other than this, the item worked flawlessly and I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.  It's a great machine.
customer_reviews.text: This stuffer is perfect for my home use operation. One person can easily operate and stuff brats or other casing sausage. Plenty of power to push a heavy product through the smallest diameter stuffing horn. The product support from LEM was a major factor as I decided to make this purchase. I called them prior to ordering. They answered every question in a very professional manner. Call them and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P.

customer_reviews.title: This machine is genius
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this machine is I didn’t buy it sooner. For the last 5 years my family has gotten together to make kielbasa and spicy Italian sausage. We had motorized machines and it would take 6-8 of us, working hard for 6-7 hours to do 40 lbs. It was exhausting. Then we bought this and our lives changed. In less than 90 minutes, with lots of talking in between, we processed 30 lbs and cleaned everything up. What used to be a once a year event is now going to happen much more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: CookaholicWife

customer_reviews.title: I would be very careful with this item
customer_reviews.text: I got it and sent it back the very same day. plugged in unit as per directions. item got to top and stopped. then the gears made funny noises. I packed it up and sent it back. that was almost 15 days ago and still haven't gotten a refund or any word whatsoever other than "on the way back". I've always wondered if products like this are factory seconds. I have to re-think latter purchases like this especially if refunds of this type take over three weeks?!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: went through the trouble to mount it on a board but wish I hadn't ordered it at all. if you put 3# in it you MIGHT get 1# into a casing. to expensive to return. save your money buy something else. the pitchures above is the amount of blow by I had every time.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction and performance
customer_reviews.text: I am less than impressed with the construction and performance of this stuff. The vertical columns are not sturdy enough to withstand the torque created by turning the handle. The entire column will lean forward as you are pressing the sausage causing the plunger and cylinder to be come misaligned. When they are misaligned, your chances of a blowout dramatically increase. The misalignment also causes more wastage at the bottom of the cylinder. If the cylinder leans far enough forward, the feet on the cylinder will slip out of their stays on the vertical column. For the same price, you can get a much higher quality 7lb 2speed stuffer from Watson's Inc.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Super easy stuffing. 5 minute cleanup. Easy feed rate control. Only 3.8 oz didn't stuff and most of that was in the tube. Silicone plunger gasket seals so tight it sucked the meat out of the tube when I retracted the plunger. No blow-by during use. Use food safe oil or spray to lube the gasket. Use drill and socket to retract faster, but not for stuffing. Lift vertical threaded rod while retracting with drill or gears Will grind. Can‘t wait to make snack sticks. Well worth the expense at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: A must must have for deer sausage!!!
customer_reviews.text: A necessity if you are serious about putting up your own sausage. I am not coordinated enough to operate it by myself but I guess you could would enough practice. The hopper is huge so you do not have to stuff the meat in there as much. I am able to stuff about 2.5 full casings before having to put meat in. You are also able to take everything apart to be able to wash which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a superb product! We thought long before spending the amount but o goodness did this make a difference to our speed and functionality, it was such a joy! The machining is so great, thank you LEM for providing an exceptional product! BUY USA paid off!
customer_reviews.author: Dvz

customer_reviews.title: LEM Delivers Again
customer_reviews.text: I have used LEM Products for years now. Never had any problems. This is my first motorized stuffer and LEM has did it again. I am very happy with my purchase. We are full time RVrs. The LEM stuffer fits perfect in my front closet when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: nepas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - previously used a Kitchen Aid mixer attachment, which was slow and difficult to manage... different world with the Lem! Couple of tips - use a slice of bread on top of your sausage mix to ensure you get the maximum number of sausages and be sure to add a cup of ice cold water to your mix before stuffing. Also I filled the edges of the stuffing tubes since they were rather harsh - I used fine grade wet’n’dry sandpaper. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: NoVAMetalReview

customer_reviews.title: Sausage stuffing refined
customer_reviews.text: I was using the grinder attachment to stuff sausage. This makes that look like something from the stone age. I asked my son to help, and after our last experience, he groaned. He sat on the counter and we stuffed 5 pounds in 5 minutes. Set up and clean-up (which was not bad) took longer. Wish I had purchased years ago. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hunziger

customer_reviews.title: Efficient sausage stuffer
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue I’d had with this machine wasn’t the machine itself but deciding what size to purchase. I’d opted for the five pounder and glad I did. The perfect quantity of meats for a run with the length of natural casings. I’m pleased with this stuffer. Reloads quickly for successive runs. Cleans up easily after all complete. I normally run batches of 25 lbs. I wished I’d purchased this much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Grear stuffer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Initial Quality. On its first job I made about 25 lbs of sausage links and it worked flawlessly. The unit is well built for the price point. I didn't have any issues with leaks around the gasket. If you crank at a reasonable speed you shouldn't have any issues. It is easy to clean and the only meat left is a little bit in the tube, which is be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Pork fat rules!
customer_reviews.text: Been running the sausage through a kidney bean plate on the grinder and decided to give this a try. Soooo much better! Sausage stays chunky and isn't turned to mush or ground too fine after going through the grinder a second time. Firm believer in this thing and only one trip through the grinder for the meat from now on.
customer_reviews.author: flyemlow

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good stuffer.
customer_reviews.text: Some peoples reviews complain about difficulty stuffing. Make sure to read the instructions carefully that come with the stuffer. Water or other liquids must be added to the meat before stuffing to make pumping easier. This will not affect flavor or quality of product. This is a requirement of any stuffers regardless of the size or design. I have made three batches of sausage now with the stuffer. Two batches were made with collagen based casings and one batch was made with hog middles. This stuffer worked extremely well and was easy to control. Cleaning and break down of the machine after use was easy. Overall this is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: ... make deer sticks it did not work out to good, so I shopped around for one of these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the caulking gun style to make deer sticks it did not work out to good, so I shopped around for one of these, I have purchased LEM products in the past and have been very pleased with them. this 5 lb stuffer works great it is the newest one out and I liked the cover for the gears so you will not get your hands caught when turning the handle thanks again LEM for a great product !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Firetech1991

customer_reviews.title: High quality produce
customer_reviews.text: have been using for awhile and it is a great product heavy duty and well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Mark Emken

customer_reviews.title: Really good and heavy duty stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Really good and heavy duty stuffer. Do yourself a favor and order the stainless tubes and get rid of the plastic ones that come with this, other than that this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Beare

customer_reviews.title: We have used this several times now making summer sausage ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used this several times now making summer sausage and it works perfectly. The only problem we might foresee is that the plunger plate is made in 2 pieces and we can see that there is meat getting between the 2. We fear it may become very hard to clean the more we use it.
customer_reviews.author: April Droog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sausage stuffer, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: After using a stand mixer attachment, I finally decided to buy a dedicated stuffer. This is much faster, much easier, and doesn't jam. All the parts are easy enough to clean. The included metal clamps work well, as with my setup I can use only one. The only feature that would be nice to have is a 2nd gearing for the crank handle.. It takes quite a few rotations to remove the plunger and refill.
customer_reviews.author: JoeF

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: After a couple times of trying to stuff with a jerky tube this is quite the improvement. I stuffed 18 mm snack sticks and as I have read they are the hardest thing to stuff because of the tube diameter. I couldn't of been happier. My only complaint is that I would of likes thd 15lb instead of 5lb but the price spread is so big I couldn't justify it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sausage stuffer...
customer_reviews.text: This stuffer is perfect. We’ve run 50lbs of fresh sausage through ours and have had zero issues. For best results we use spray olive oil on the interior and only fill 4 pounds in the cylinder per run. Easy to use, easy to crank... Its perfect and looks good too. Support this US company, try their spices too!!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment. I just love making sausages and this works very well. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Plastic shavings and Hard to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Why wouldn't you make this thing smooth instead of bumpy pot metal garbage? Terrible product. Does it stuff sausage? Barely. Is it a pain to clean and use? Yes. Does the plastic seal forcing the meat through the interior of the tube/cannister shave off on the coarse pot metal? Yes. Do I enjoy plastic in my sausage? No
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: woot!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. I went from the kitchen aid to this. I went for an afternoon of work to an hour of ease. It was so easy to stuff. It was easy to clean. No issues at all. Used three times now.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Needs a chart in the manual to tell what diamter tubes to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I made about 15lbs of deer snack sticks with this last year. It worked great. I did not give it 5 stars becase it was somewhat difficult to tell what diameter skins to get and the ones that we got were a little bit to small. This slowed the process down.
customer_reviews.author: Skate_VA

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have used my grinder to stuff sausages. It was very time consuming and my sausages were mushy Stuffed 50lbs of summer sausage in about 3 hours with this and the meat has a great coarse texture! So very easy!! Funnels aren’t small enough of anything under 21mm (snack sticks)
customer_reviews.author: BrentSte

customer_reviews.title: Good stuffer for small batches
customer_reviews.text: It works well. There's no meat blow-by around the piston, and when you reach the bottom there's very little meat left in the cylinder to deal with. Knocking one star because it's over priced and the tube retaining nut ought to be stainless not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and control the flow of meat
customer_reviews.text: Got this and used it right away. Really a time saver vs using the kitchen aide stuffer. This is much easier to control. The meat wasn't ground up more that what came from the butcher, which makes a difference on Polish sausage. Because you will be using salt be sure to clean the machine after use. I used the medium size novel for polish sausage. I highly recommend getting a small "head" of meat out the tip of the nozzle for easier casing loading.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Schneiderwind

customer_reviews.title: this thing beats the heck out of stuffing with your ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing beats the heck out of stuffing with your grinder. Makes fast work of ground meat into sausage casings of all sizes. The filler tubes are plastic and a bit thick, so I got the LEM 606A tube as well. That was the ticket for snack sticks.
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to spend the extra $ on LEM's sausage stuffer when there's cheaper options out there, but in hindsight I'm glad I did. This product has performed wonderfully and I've found to be easy to clean. I bought LEM's care and cleaning kit to go with. I only wish it had come with the 3/8 stuffing tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly constructed sausage stuffer. This is really good for things like hotdogs, or sausage where the meat is quite finely ground. It’s pretty heavy duty, so you have to be serious about cranking out a lot of sausages to have need for this stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Filbert McGee

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuffer, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: 20 pounds of hot stick made in the first week of owning this and super happy with my purchase. I spent several weeks looking at different stuffers, and almost opted for a cheaper brand. Glad I didnt. This thing is built like a tank. It came with 3 stuffer tubes, but none were small enough for snack stick. Purchased a separate 3/8" tube for around $20.
customer_reviews.author: PA buyer

customer_reviews.title: Husband is happy and so am I
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband when he makes venison sticks. It works great, makes fast work of many sticks as you can fill that puppy up with 5 lbs of meet vs 1 lb what we had before. Also Ladies.......its so good....he wont need your help!! thats kind of the main reason I bought it, but we will keep that a secret. He is happy, I am happy.....what more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Why did I buy a grinder to make sausage?  This thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Why did I buy a grinder to make sausage? This thing is amazing. I will never use my sausage grinder/stuffer again. I should have bought this first. Sooooo easy. It took us about 10 minutes to process 5 lbs of sausage and with 0 waste. No issues at all and easy to clean up. I almost expected some push back out of the top, but the air release valve on the top keeps that from happening. Such a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: sandi buhlman

customer_reviews.title: Rookies - it's time to elevate your game
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I have been using a KA mixer with sausage attachment for a few years now and by the time we're done with 5LB of sausage we're beat. Starting using preground pork from a local butcher which saves a lot of work and today used the new LEM 1606. Game changer! To extrude 5lb took less than 20 minutes. Next sausage making day we'll do 20lb. Never had sausages look this good or come out this easy. This is a must buy for the home sausage maker. PS; our own custom flavor - jalapeno/cayenne/asiago sweet italian. Mmm :)
customer_reviews.author: Shamelessbill

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to clean Works best if you Clamp it down to the surface. I wish they would make one with a foot control so you could turn it off and on when you want to. It also leaves meat in the elbow and tube but I just push that out with a paper towel, make it into a couple patties, and throw them on the grill
customer_reviews.author: pleased

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality stuffer. I had a major issue with a similar stuffer having meat blow by the plunger with smaller casings(sold for about $180), but it was out of it's return period. No fixing that one, so it gets used for summer sausage and filling meat bags. This one doesn't have a spec of meat blow by, and stuffs even the smallest casings I have. If I could do it all over again, I'd have spent the extra money for this right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Schneider

customer_reviews.title: 10X faster than the stuffer that comes with the grinders
customer_reviews.text: Stuffed 10 pounds of Hot Italian sausage and 10 pounds of Polish Kielbasa so far. Works very well and is not too bad to clean. Far exceeds the stuffer that came with my grinder, much less hassle and at least 10X faster.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH; 5 STAR MEAT PRESS
customer_reviews.text: Great machine... well made, works better than expected, comes apart easy for cleaning. Love this product. Have had this about 7 months now and have had a lot of opportunities to use it. If you're in the market for a quality meat press, GET this one. It is incredible. The one down side is that for snack sticks/bites (like my photo) there isnt a nozzle that will do this size. (15mm to 27mm.) However, Amazon sells them and they are compatible with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with this product. It is easy to use, it does what it is supposed to do, and cleans up real easy. I have mine clamped down on a corner of a cabinet so I can use two opposing corners to anchor it and it’s perfectly sturdy that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to 20lb motorized from 25lb manual crank and we're working about 120% more efficiently. What a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Want to make sausage??
customer_reviews.text: This is what you need. Throw away your useless Kitchenaid stuffer attachments. This sausage stuffer is the best and is worth every cent. Easy to use and easy to clean. It's professional and gets the job done quick. Trust me you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy well built
customer_reviews.text: My dad and i always used our KitchenAid grinder to stuff sausage...no more...this thing looks great and performs very well...5 pounds of brats using hog casing took about 3 or 4 minutes once we were all set up. Cant wait to get plastic casings and try some skinless hot dogs...perfect entry level product that is made to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Must have for making snack sticks
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! So glad that I upgraded to a sausage stuffer this year. Making snack sticks goes way faster, and stuffing summer sausage is a breeze. The only complaint is the clean up - but it's still easier than cleaning the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment
customer_reviews.text: This grinder works very well. Consistent grinds, easy to use, easy clean up and it's well made. Came with clamps for temporary counter mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Woods

customer_reviews.title: great sausage stuffer
customer_reviews.text: My only wish would be for a second gear to allow for quicker removal of the chamber. Unit works great, air release valve really did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gieseman

customer_reviews.title: wonderful unit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my spouse; the unit was easier to fill, use and clean than I anticipated. Getting the prepared meat into the casings had been the hardest part of making sausage - no longer with this unit! Well made, love it!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was confident it was a quality product. It is a quality made stuffer, heavy duty and I know it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: MRiley

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly easy to stuff casings!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment if you're in to making your own sausage. I still use a mixer attachment for grinding right now, but this thing is way worth it for the actual stuffing process. easy to clean, well made, perfect size for 5 lb batches.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Poling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was missing and boy does it make it a lot easier to make sausages or brats or burgers
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: one of the best investments ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this sooner. I can't believe how much time it saves when stuffing sausage or snack sticks. Super easy to clean to
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cejka

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I don't like about this machine! Easy to use, easy to clean, just the right size and the foot pedal is awesome. It never clicked off as other reviews stated.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this made my home sausage making so much easier,my grand daughter of 7 years turns it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Richards

customer_reviews.title: Grab a little cutting board and bolt it down to that.
customer_reviews.text: Opens a whole new door to homemade sausages. After trying the grinder several times I bite the bullet and bought this stuffer. Little tricky with the c clamps but if you’re stuffing by yourself this will make life so much easier
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Clary

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He is extremely happy with this stuffer. It works great. He has used it to make deer sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Only way to stuff sausages. Do not bother with the stuffing attachment for a Kitchen Aid Grinder. Easy to use, easy to clean. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Lem Sausage Stuffer is a great product easy to use and easy to clean it performed better than the other machines I used, highly recommend this prduct.
customer_reviews.author: John DiNatale

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the stuffer attachment on my meat grinder, but it's a nightmare to operate and almost requires two people. This stand alone stuffer is 10 times easier and better.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sausage making
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again. Only possible change would be get a bigger unit.
customer_reviews.author: heartsurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how well this stuffer operates. I was able to stuff about 400 lbs of sausage into hog casings in under 2 hours. The only thing I would change is I would like to be able to vary the speed with the foot switch rather than on the motor unit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Deck

customer_reviews.title: perfect stuffer
customer_reviews.text: there was no over the top leakage of meat. It holds the full 5# and a little more. Wish it came with a smaller tube for snack sticks. It was so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Iris

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, super functional
customer_reviews.text: Beats the smaller plunger/lever arm style with much less (functionality zero) blowby. I make about 100 lbs of sausage a year and this makes the process so much more pleasant. Most everyone that buys the lever style upgrades to a stainless crank style like this, just get the nicer one like this from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Calidris

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great stuffer. No problems. You'll need to buy an additional nozzle for the smaller 17mm snack sticks but worth it. Cleans up pretty easily. Love this stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: rsinl

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and is good quality. I just wishared there was a quicker way to refill it. It takes forever to turn the handle the other way, when it's empty. I wish I would have gotten a bigger one, so I didn't have to fill it as often.
customer_reviews.author: Jmbeitz

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Strong. Used it for the first time and sausage came out pretty good. Will get better with practice. Solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to stuff sausage, easy clean up afterwords.
customer_reviews.text: I usually make 5 lb batches of summer sausage so this unit is perfect for my needs. The crank is easy to use with little effort and clean up is very simple.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for any kitchen. I am never going ...
customer_reviews.text: A must-have for any kitchen. I am never going to buy sausages from a store again after trying this stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: The Pits

customer_reviews.title: Great sausage stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stuff summer sausage and snack stick links. You will not be disappointed. I went from making them with a jerky cannon to the lem stuffer and glad I did. Holds 5lbs of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Love it. After trying (for the first time) to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. After trying (for the first time) to make sausage with another stuffer, we bought this one. So easy and fast. just the right size for us. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like this product to simplify sausage and snack stick making. It is not dishwasher recommended but cleanup is fairly easy. It is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ben Reese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! My son wanted this for his birthday & ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My son wanted this for his birthday & we are certainly enjoying the benefits! Great time & effort saver for all your sausage & meat stick needs!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I just made my first batch of sausage ever and this stuffer worked great. Look like a pro on the first try. It is effortless and easy to get the hang of, I recommend adding the water per instructions as it makes it flo so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN E HUBBS

customer_reviews.title: Failure Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I can't truly write a review about the performance of the product because when opening I discovered that the silicone piston o-ring was cut. Kind of important so never used. The best part is that I called Amazon and they told me that I was outside of the return window. Called LEM and they are a 9 to 5, M through F business. Spooned 25 lbs of sausage into freezer bags. And why did I buy this?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding stuffer. Bought the 5 pounder...wish I had bought the 7, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuffer, get it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, cranks effortlessly and easy to reload and clean. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ovidio

customer_reviews.title: Next level stuffing
customer_reviews.text: It works absolutely fantastic. Need 2 persons to make it really easy. Quite sure you can work it alone. But after the first casing we had the hang of it and stuffed the sausage like Champs.
customer_reviews.author: Willem

customer_reviews.title: Its Lem, you really CANT go wrong..
customer_reviews.text: All my equipment is LEM including my #32 grinder. Never a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Clay C.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Sausage Making
customer_reviews.text: I was using my KitchAid grinder attachment to stuff sausage into casings and it took FOREVER. I ordered the LEM stuffer and it was a GAME CHANGER! I still use the KA grinder for the meat, but then use the LEM for stuffing into casings. It cut the time by 10X! No kidding! This is a great investment for anyone who makes sausage...a lot or a little. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of hand cranking, love the new stuffer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elby

customer_reviews.title: Lot of air in my sausages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to eliminate air from my cured sausages.After 20 days cure i was find worst picture in my sausages.There has a tons of air inside of cassings.Then i have decide to make sausages without this stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Petar kehayov

customer_reviews.title: Lem 3 Pound Sausage Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: This sausage stuffer requires an adequate amount of amount of physical strength and dexterity to operate efficiently. The stuffer must be secured to a table or other stationary object to work well. My wife was unable to use this product by herself. But, we found a solution: she feeds the sausage meat into the chute and I pull the handle down. So, be advised; the stuffer works well if you have the strength to pull down on the handle. In general, we are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very easy to use and clean. Make sure if you use 19mm or smaller casing to buy the extra tube that will fit the casing sold seperately. The 3 tubes it comes with will not work with 19mm or smaller casing.
customer_reviews.author: Danny James

customer_reviews.title: Homemade sausage!  Such a treat!
customer_reviews.text: This sausage stuffer is wonderful. So easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Bucher

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Make sure you order the smalller stuffing tube ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed . Works great . Make sure you order the smalller stuffing tube if you want to do Snack Sticks
customer_reviews.author: William J Whittaker

product_meta.title: LEM Products 1606 5-Pound Stainless Steel Vertical Sausage Stuffer
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Manual/ 5-Pound Vertical

The LEM 1606 5-Pound Stainless Steel Vertical Sausage Stuffer has a stainless-steel base and cylinder and all metal gears. Our gears are now covered by a protective gear box. This innovation takes safety and durability to the next level by ensuring your gears and your food are well protected. Clamp the stuffer to a table or counter top and crank out perfect sausage every time. Comes with 3 plastic stuffing tubes: 1/2", 3/4", and 1" ID (11/16", 7/8", 1" OD). Cylinder removes for easy filling and cleaning. Air valve release pushes air out the top instead of into the casing. Your LEM product is warranted for two years from date of purchase, covering parts and labor. LEM Products makes home meat processing easy! We deliver high quality meat processing equipment: meat grinders, jerky making equipment, and vacuum sealers along with the needed supplies for the hunter and home meat processor. Our products allow everyone from butchers, restaurants, and the at-home meat processor to make delicious sausage, jerky and other meat products, all while controlling the healthy content of the foods they provide for their family and friends. LEM is the leader in game processing. We research what our consumers need and translate that into products that help hunters save time and money by turning their hard-earned game into the purest organic meat that can be found. All of our LEM products and Backwoods seasonings have been customized and crafted with the home game processor in mind. Our goal is to deliver high quality products that make food preparation easy and fun. We will support our customers with end-to-end service and guaranteed satisfaction. We believe home processing to be an essential part of the outdoor experience and will continue to promote the responsible use of our greatest gift, the bountiful outdoors.
feature_bullets: Cylinder holds 5 Pounds of meat; Cylinder removes easily to fill and clean
Hardened steel gears with a protective gear box; Stainless steel base and cylinder
Includes (Two) clamps to secure unit to counter top
Approximate Dimensions: 15" (H) x 9 1/4" (W) x 6" (Deep); Cylinder Dimensions: 8 1/4" (H) x 5 1/2" (Diameter)
Comes with 1/2", 3/4" and 1" ID (11/16", 7/8", 1" OD) plastic stuffing tubes; 2 Year warranty covering parts and labor
